Key Match Events: India won the match by 7 wickets
Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma scored 0 and 3 runs respectively
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and opted to bowl first
Aaron Jones' United States was the opponent
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma spoke about the team's relief after winning the match
Aaron Jones, USA skipper, spoke about the team's performance and future plans
Miscellaneous Highlights: USA was penalized 5 runs due to slow over rate
